description: Canonical name of the dataset recorded in the metadata catalog; used to uniquely identify the physical table or view.
Functional domain or application module the dataset supports, used to group related fleet management data assets.
Free-text notes describing the datasetâ€™s purpose, contents, and usage context.
User account or system process that created this metadata record.
Date and time when this metadata record was created.
User account that last updated this metadata record.
Date and time of the most recent update to this metadata record.
Indicates the kind of database object (e.g., relational table or virtual view).
Name of the upstream source object this dataset is derived from; supports lineage and impact analysis.
Flag indicating the dataset is deprecated or not in active use (Y/N); confirm coding with SME.
Controls whether the dataset is visible and selectable in query tools and self-service data catalogs.
